verses.verse: Now there was a certain<WH259> man<WH376> of Ramathaim Zophim,<WH7436> of the hill<WH2022> country of Ephraim,<WH669> and his name<WH8034> was Elkanah,<WH511> the son<WH1121> of Jeroham,<WH3395> the son<WH1121> of Elihu,<WH453> the son<WH1121> of Tohu,<WH8459> the son<WH1121> of Zuph,<WH6689> an Ephraimite:<WH673>

and he had two<WH8147> wives;<WH802> the name<WH8034> of the one<WH259> was Hannah,<WH2584> and the name<WH8034> of other<WH8145> Peninnah:<WH6444> and Peninnah<WH6444> had children,<WH3206> but Hannah<WH2584> had no children.<WH3206>

This<WH1931> man<WH376> went up<WH5927> out of his city<WH5892> from year to year<WH3117> to worship<WH7812> and to sacrifice<WH2076> to Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> in Shiloh.<WH7887> The two<WH8147> sons<WH1121> of Eli,<WH5941> Hophni<WH2652> and Phinehas,<WH6372> priests<WH3548> to Yahweh,<WH3068> were there.
When the day<WH3117> came that Elkanah<WH511> sacrificed,<WH2076> he gave<WH5414> to Peninnah<WH6444> his wife,<WH802> and to all her sons<WH1121> and her daughters,<WH1323> portions:<WH4490>
but to Hannah<WH2584> he gave<WH5414> a<WH259> double<WH639> portion;<WH4490> for he loved<WH157> Hannah,<WH2584> but Yahweh<WH3068> had shut up<WH5462> her womb.<WH7358>
Her rival<WH6869> provoked<WH3707> her severely,<WH3708> to make her fret,<WH7481> because Yahweh<WH3068> had shut<WH5462> up<WH1157> her womb.<WH7358>

As he did<WH6213> so year<WH8141> by year,<WH8141> when<WH1767> she went up<WH5927> to the house<WH1004> of Yahweh,<WH3068> so she provoked<WH3707> her;<WH1058> therefore she wept, and didn't<WH398> eat.

Elkanah<WH511> her husband<WH376> said<WH559> to her,<WH2584> "Hannah, why do you weep?<WH1058> Why don't<WH398> you eat? Why is your heart<WH3824> grieved?<WH3415> Am I not better<WH2896> to you than ten<WH6235> sons?<WH1121>"

So Hannah<WH2584> rose up<WH6965> after<WH310> they had eaten<WH398> in Shiloh,<WH7887> and after<WH310> they had drunk.<WH8354> Now Eli<WH5941> the priest<WH3548> was sitting<WH3427> on his seat<WH3678> by the doorpost<WH4201> of the temple<WH1964> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
She was in bitterness<WH4751> of soul,<WH5315> and prayed<WH6419> to Yahweh,<WH3068> and wept<WH1058> bitterly.<WH1058>

She vowed<WH5087> a vow,<WH5088> and said,<WH559> "Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> if you will indeed<WH7200> look<WH7200> on the affliction<WH6040> of your handmaid,<WH519> and remember<WH2142> me,<WH7911> and not forget your handmaid,<WH519> but will give<WH5414> to your handmaid<WH519> a<WH582> boy,<WH2233> then I will give<WH5414> him to Yahweh<WH3068> all the days<WH3117> of his life,<WH2416> and no razor<WH4177> shall come<WH5927> on his head.<WH7218>"
It happened,<WH7235> as she continued praying<WH6419> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> that Eli<WH5941> saw<WH5941> her mouth.<WH6310>

Now Hannah<WH2584> spoke<WH1696> in her heart.<WH3820> Only her lips<WH8193> moved,<WH5128> but her voice<WH6963> was not heard.<WH8085> Therefore Eli<WH5941> thought<WH2803> she had been drunken.<WH7910>
Eli<WH5941> said<WH559> to her,<WH7937> "How long will you be drunken? Put away<WH5493> your wine from you.<WH3196>"

Hannah<WH2584> answered,<WH6030> "No,<WH113> my lord, I am a woman<WH802> of a sorrowful<WH7186> spirit.<WH7307> I have drunk<WH8354> neither wine<WH3196> nor strong drink,<WH7941> but I poured out<WH8210> my soul<WH5315> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>
Don't<WH5414> count your handmaid<WH519> for<WH6440> a wicked<WH1100> woman;<WH1323> for I have been speaking<WH1696> out of the abundance<WH7230> of my complaint<WH7879> and my provocation.<WH3708>"
Then Eli<WH5941> answered,<WH6030> "Go<WH3212> in peace;<WH7965> and may the God<WH3212> of Israel<WH3478> grant<WH5414> your petition<WH7596> that you have asked of him.<WH7592>"

She said,<WH559> "Let your handmaid<WH8198> find<WH4672> favor<WH2580> in your sight.<WH5869>" So the woman<WH802> went<WH3212> her way,<WH1870> and ate;<WH398> and her facial expression wasn't<WH6440> sad any more.

They rose up<WH7925> in the morning<WH1242> early,<WH7925> and worshiped<WH7812> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> and returned,<WH7725> and came<WH935> to their house<WH1004> to Ramah:<WH7414> and Elkanah<WH511> knew<WH3045> Hannah<WH2584> his wife;<WH802> and Yahweh<WH3068> remembered her.<WH2142>

It happened,<WH3117> when the time had come,<WH8622> that Hannah<WH2584> conceived,<WH2029> and bore<WH3205> a son;<WH1121> and she named<WH7121> him<WH8034> Samuel,<WH8050> saying,<WH7592> "Because I have asked him of Yahweh.<WH3068>"
The man<WH376> Elkanah,<WH511> and all his house,<WH1004> went up<WH5927> to offer<WH2076> to Yahweh<WH3068> the yearly<WH3117> sacrifice,<WH2076> and his vow.<WH5088>

But Hannah<WH2584> didn't<WH5927> go up; for she said<WH559> to her husband,<WH376> "Not until the child<WH5288> is weaned;<WH1580> then I will bring<WH935> him,<WH7200> that he may appear before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> and stay<WH3427> there<WH5704> forever.<WH5769>"

Elkanah<WH511> her husband<WH376> said<WH559> to her,<WH6213> "Do what seems<WH5869> good<WH2896> to you.<WH3427> Wait until you have weaned<WH1580> him;<WH3068> only may Yahweh establish<WH6965> his word.<WH1697>" So the woman<WH802> waited<WH3427> and nursed<WH3243> her son,<WH1121> until she weaned him.<WH1580>

When she had weaned<WH1580> him,<WH5927> she took him up with her,<WH7969> with three bulls,<WH6499> and one<WH259> ephah<WH374> of meal,<WH7058> and a bottle<WH5035> of wine,<WH3196> and brought<WH935> him to Yahweh<WH3068>'s house<WH1004> in Shiloh.<WH7887> The child<WH5288> was young.<WH5288>
They killed<WH7819> the bull,<WH6499> and brought<WH935> the child<WH5288> to Eli.<WH5941>
She said,<WH559> "Oh,<WH994> my lord,<WH113> as your soul<WH5315> lives,<WH2416> my lord,<WH113> I am the woman<WH802> who stood<WH5324> by you here,<WH6419> praying to Yahweh.<WH3068>
For this child<WH5288> I prayed;<WH6419> and Yahweh<WH3068> has given<WH5414> me my petition<WH7596> which I asked of him.<WH7592>
Therefore also I have granted<WH7592> him to Yahweh.<WH3068> As long as he lives<WH3117> he is granted<WH7592> to Yahweh.<WH3068>" He worshiped<WH7812> Yahweh there.<WH3068>
